entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intellisense not work with interface #68594
  • [BUG] cannot rename symbols across projects #68593
    Preview 1.1
  • Extract method doesn't highlight newly named method fully #68592
    17.7 P4
  • [BUG] References Code Lens always enabled #68591
    17.7 P4
  • [BUG] When upgrading to dev kit the source generators no longer work. #68590
    17.7 P4
  • [BUG] Documentation comments missing newline support and indentation #68589
    17.7 P4
  • [BUG] Analyzers and code fixes not working in C# Dev Kit? #68588
    17.7 P4
  • Add missing using directives on paste #68586
  • Project system error randomly on `ActionBlockSlimAsync` #68584
  • Duplicate variable declaration allowed #68583
  • Make brackets of class and methods bold #68582
  • collapse one-line xml comments too in C# files #68581
  • Battery/power save mode #68580
  • C# editor should provide a collapsable region for comments #68579
  • Incorrect IDE0045 simplified if expression #68578
  • `GetTypeInfo` returns incorrectly null-annotated types for deconstruction #68572
  • Cache vs-mef composition to improve startup perf #68568
  • Use smarter source text implementation in LSP server #68567

Closed

  • [BUG] wrong variable highlights #68587
    17.7 P4
  • EnC: Adding public method to a library and invoking it within the same edit session #68293
  • Incorrect error message on using static directive with alias to non-named type #68546
  • Need to add support for `using unsafe static <Type>;` #67329
    C# 12.0
  • Var CodeLens #68585
    17.7 P4
  • C# 11 required properties do not compile on dotnet 6 #68478
  • Restrict background analysis scope to reduce CPU consumption in live analysis #38429
    16.5
  • Partial class implementing identically named file interfaces with identically named members should not confuse them #68219
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Generic interceptors #68602
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Stop reporting CS7101 on runtime that supports generic updates #68601
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Refactor BindExtensionMethod method and add some assertions #68599
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update handling of collection literals with no target type #68598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Flesh out implementation of ref-safety rules for inline array operations. #68597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Revert "Switch to new lower-overhead spell checking protocol" #68569
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix error message when trying to use using-static with an invalid type #68571
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix document-highlights not working in vscode #68596
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove stale comments #68557
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, Next
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch #68524
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • add review comment to sb files #68409
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Improve error reporting around inline array access. #68551
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Only make members required when RequiredMemberAttribute is present #68577
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Package Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Test.Utilities for razor #68417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge "interceptors" experimental feature to main #68564
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Gracefully handle no analyzers case in DiagnosticComputer #68545
    Area-IDE, Tenet-Reliability, untriaged, Next
  • Address remaining feedback from #68547 #68570
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Include file-local name prefix in names of explicit interface implementations #68331
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Don't rebind object initializer parents #68449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Correct interpolated string addition parts counting #68562
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve collection literal parsing #68561
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets - `for` and `forr` snippets #68508
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Handle folders in source-generated file paths #68494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move tests of `IDE0060` to `VerifyCS` #68350
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • update System.CommandLine to the latest version #68549
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Primary ctors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
